description: Highly configurable prompt builder for Bash, ZSH and PowerShell written in Go. It's inspired by the [Oh My ZSH](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh)[Bullet Train](https://github.com/caiogondim/bullet-train.zsh) theme but runs significantly faster.
summary: Highly configurable prompt builder for Bash, ZSH and PowerShell written in Go.
author: Jiri Tyr
